description: This script provides utility functions for network management and process handling in an embedded Linux environment, including checking and killing processes, retrieving IP and MAC addresses, and handling specific events based on arguments.

methods.name: checkProcess
methods.description: Checks whether a process with a given name is running by inspecting the process list.

methods.name: killProcess
methods.description: Kills a process with a specified name by retrieving its process ID and sending SIGKILL.

methods.name: getCMIPAddress
methods.description: Retrieves the IP address (IPv4 or IPv6) associated with a specific network interface.

methods.name: getCMMACAddress
methods.description: Obtains the MAC address of the Ethernet interface.
